actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the U.S. Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgement upon the claim of Charles Bernstein, of Washington, D.C.

summary.text: Confers jurisdiction upon the United States Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgement upon the claim of Charles Bernstein, of Washington, D.C.

titles.title: A bill conferring jurisdiction upon the U.S. Court of Claims to hear, determine, and render judgement upon the claim of Charles Bernstein, of Washington, D.C.
